name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare/launch.exe

content:
Desktop: true
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the GOG installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare/launch.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine: null
